title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.
author: Contributor Content

title: Monday’s Vikings-Rams NFL Playoff Game Moved to Arizona Due to L.A. Wildfires
description: The devastating wildfires in the Los Angeles area have forced another change: Monday’s NFL playoff game between the Minnesota Vikings and L.A. Rams, originally scheduled to be played at L.A.’s SoFi Stadium, will now be played at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona, the league announced on Thursday. “In the interest of public safety, Monday’s […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: TVLine Items: Severance Now on Roku, Twisted Love TV Adaptation and More
description: Ahead of the acclaimed Apple TV+ drama’s (lonnnng-awaited) return, Severance Season 1 is now available to watch for free on the Roku Channel, for a limited time (until Sunday, Jan. 19). Roku is also offering a “Fan Experience” that includes a free preview of Severance Season 2, behind-the-scenes content, an exclusive cast interview and more. […]
author: Riannucci
